---
title: "B4DT vs ERP"
output: html_document
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
library(tidyverse)
library(readr)
library(stringr)
library(tidyr)
```

```{r}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
table1 <- read.csv("T0004-10.1080_16506073.2018.1478447.csv")
table1 <- table1 %>%
  mutate(B4DT = NULL)  %>%
  rename(Measurement = X.) %>%
  mutate(ERP = NULL) %>%
  rename(B4DT = X) %>%
  rename(ERP = X.1) 
view(table1)

# table1[B4DT] = table1[B4DT].str.replace('%','')
view(table1)

clean_data <- table1[-c(1,3,5,10), ]
clean_data$B4DT<-gsub("%","",as.character(clean_data$B4DT))
clean_data$ERP<-gsub("%","",as.character(clean_data$ERP))
clean_data$ERP<-gsub("*","",as.character(clean_data$ERP))
view(clean_data)

sorted <- levels(clean_data$Measurement) <- c("Declined Treatment", 
  "Dropped Treatment", "Remitted Post-assessment", "Not Remitted", "Relapsed",
  "Recovered (non-remitters)") %>% as.tibble() %>%
  mutate(B4DT = clean_data$B4DT, ERP = clean_data$ERP)
view(sorted)


final_data <- pivot_longer(sorted, cols = 2:3, names_to = "Treatment", values_to = "Proportion") %>%
  rename(Measurement = value)
view(final_data)
```

```{r}
final_data %>%
  ggplot(data = final_data, 
         mapping = aes(x = Measurement, y = Proportion, fill = Treatment)) +
    geom_col(stat = "identity", width = 0.8, position = "dodge") + coord_flip()
```
